nosun.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
nosun.description: While in sunlight, the $name has disadvantage on Attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight

pack.name: Pack Tactics
pack.description: The $name has advantage on an Attack roll against a creature if at least one of the $name's allies is within 5 ft. of the creature and the ally isn't Incapacitated.

fey.name: Fey Ancestry
fey.description: The ${name} has advantage on saving throws against being Charmed, and magic canâ€™t put it to sleep.

amphibious.name: Amphibious
amphibious.description: The ${name} can breathe air and water.
